DOC.brief_title: BIIB033 In Acute Optic Neuritis ( AON )
DOC.criteria: Key Ability provide write consent authorization require law . Confirmed diagnosis AON All male female subject childbearing potential must practice effective contraception study willing able continue contraception least 6 month last dose study treatment . Key Prior episode ( ) optic neuritis loss vision due AON . Subjects establish diagnosis multiple sclerosis exclude except newly diagnose base current episode AON positive brain magnetic resonance imaging result consistent 2010 revision McDonald 's criterion . Previous history clinically significant disease . Females positive pregnancy test result , pregnant , breastfeeding , plan conceive study . History human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis C virus antibody , hepatitis B virus . History evidence drug alcohol abuse within 2 year prior Screening .
